It supports the chat functions from sites like Facebook, Jabber, MSN, AIM, Gadu Gadu, and more, and brings them all together so you can do your messaging, voice, and video chats all in one app, no matter how many contacts you have in all your other programs. All you need to do is set up this one chat with all of your other accounts and you are ready to talk to everyone you know without having to switch from application to application to talk to them all. This app also allows file sharing, in case you have pictures, documents, or media to send to loved ones while you chat. You can keep in touch with all your friends and family with this awesome app!
column29: Soporta texto, voz, video chat y transferencia de archivos
column30: Esta aplicación de chat es increíble. Es compatible con todos tus sitios y programas favoritos como Facebook, Jabber, MSN, AIM, Gadu Gadu, y más. Los trae a todos juntos para que puedas chatear o hacer llamadas de voz o video en una sola aplicación. Todos tus contactos pueden estar en un solo lugar. Todo lo que necesitas hacer es configurar esta app con todas tus otras cuentas, con la ayuda de un asistente de configuración, ¡y estarás listo para hablar con todos tus amigos y familiares! Esta aplicación también permite el intercambio de archivos, en caso de tener imágenes, documentos o medios que quieras compartir con otros. Podrás mantenerte en contacto con todos sus amigos y familiares con esta aplicación impresionante!
column33: Programa de mensagens instantâneas com suporte de texto, voz, chat por vídeo e transferência de arquivos
column34: Este app de conversação é uma ferramenta fantástica. É compatível com chats de vários sites na internet, como o Facebook, Jabber, MSN, AIM, Gadu Gadu e muitos mais, para que você possa trocar mensagens instantâneas, conversas de vídeo e áudio num só app, independentemente do número de contatos que você tenha em todos os programas. Basta  configurar esta aplicação com as outras contas que você tiver e estará pronto para conversar com todas as pessoas que você conhece sem ter que trocar de uma aplicação para outra. Este app também permite o compartilhamento de arquivos, para quando quiser enviar fotos, documentos ou outros arquivos pelo chat. Com este app você vai manter sempre contato com todos os teus amigos e sua família!

column25: Take a picture of your screen to save
column26: Do you ever wish you could take a picture of your screen to save? Well now you can, with this easy-to-use screenshot app. You can choose to take a shot of your entire screen, or of just one of your windows. That way, you can make sure to save just what you need and nothing more.
column29: Toma una foto de tu pantalla y guárdala
column30: ¿Has querido alguna vez tomarle una foto a tu pantalla para poderla guardar? Ahora puedes, con esta app de captura de pantalla que es muy fácil de usar. Puedes escoger entre tomarle una foto a tu pantalla entera, o a solo una de las ventanas abiertas. Así puedes asegurarte que solo estas guardando lo que necesitas y nada más.

column25: Geography learning aid for KDE
column26: KGeography is an aid for learning about world geography. You can use it to explore a map, show information about regions and features, and play quiz games to test your geography knowledge.
column29: Ayuda para aprender sobre la geografía
column30: Descubre tu mundo con esta app. Explora diversos mapas para aprender sobre cada región.

column25: Periodic table and chemistry tools
column26: Kalzium is a full-featured chemistry application, including a Periodic Table of Elements, chemical reference, chemical equation solver, and 3D molecule viewer.
column29: Tabla periodica y herramientas químicas
column30: Esta app viene con muchas funciones para aprender sobre la química. Incluye la tabla periódica, referencias y ayuda para solucionar ecuaciones químicas.

column25: Fraction learning aid for KDE
column26: KBruch is an aid for learning how to calculate with fractions.
column29: Ayuda para aprender sobre las fracciones
column30: KBruch contiene materiales para ayudarte a aprender como hacer cálculos con fracciones.

column25: Flashcard learning program
column26: KWordQuiz is a general purpose flashcard program, typically used for vocabulary training. KWordQuiz can open vocabulary data in various formats, including the kvtml format used by KDE programs such as Parley, the WQL format used by WordQuiz for Windows, the xml.gz format used by Pauker, and CSV text.
column29: Programa para aprender usando tarjetas virtuales
column30: Crea tarjetas virtuales de vocabulario para ayudarte a aprender nuevas palabras or tarjetas de datos que necesitas memorizar. Esta app les será demasiado útil a estudiantes, y es muy fácil de usar.

column25: Atomix puzzle game
column26: KAtomic is a puzzle game in which the player slides atoms around the board to assemble a molecule.
column29: Aprende sobre átomos y moléculas con este juego increíble
column30: En este juego debes mover los átomos para poder formar diferentes moléculas.

column25: Wire puzzle game
column26: KNetwalk is a puzzle game where the player arranges sections of wire to connect all the computers on the board.
column29: Cables y rompecabezas
column30: En este juego debes conectar diferentes cables para poder formar una conexión entre las computadoras que aparecen en tu pantalla.

column25: Port of the classic BSD console game robots
column26: Killbots is a simple game of evading killer robots. The robots are numerous and their sole objective is to destroy you. Fortunately for you, their creator has focused on quantity rather than quality and as a result the robots are severely lacking in intelligence. Your superior wit and a fancy teleportation device are your only weapons against the never-ending stream of mindless automatons.
column29: Un juego de robots asesinos
column30: En este juego simple tienes que escaparte de robots. Son asesinos que tienen un solo objetivo: destruirte. Afortunadamente, su creador se enfocó en crear muchos en vez de crearlos de buena calidad. Tu inteligencia superior y un aparato de teletransporte te ayudarán a combatir estos robots.

column25: Dots and boxes game
column26: KSquares is a game where two players take turns connecting dots on a grid to complete the most squares.
column29: Juego de puntos y cuadrados
column30: En este juego dos personas se toman turnos en conectar puntos de una cuadrícula para completar cuadrados.

column25: Pac-Man clone
column26: Kapman is a clone of the well known game Pac-Man. You must go through the levels escaping ghosts in a maze. You lose a life when a ghost eats you, but you can eat the ghosts for a few seconds when eating an energizer. You win points when eating pills, energizers, and bonus, and you win one life for each 10,000 points. When you have eaten all the pills and energizers of a level, you go to the next level, and the player and ghost speeds increase.
column29: Clon de Pac-Man
column30: Esta app es un clon del famoso Pac-Man. Tienes que avanzar por los diferentes niveles mientras que te escapes de los fantasmas en cada laberinto. Puedes ganar puntos, recuperar vida o tener más energía si pasas sobre las pastillas que aparecen en tu pantalla.

column25: Stamp drawing toy
column26: Potato Guy is a drawing toy for small children with several activities. Give the potato a funny face, clothes, and other goodies. Build a small town, complete with school, zoo, and fire department. Create a fantastic moonscape with spaceships and aliens. Potato Guy can speak the name of each the object in several languages, to assist in learning basic vocabulary.
column29: Juego para dibujar y usar estampillas
column30: Este juego esta diseñado para niños pequeños. Dibuja, usa estampillas, y colorea en este mundo para crear una obra de arte inolvidable.

column25: Color lines game
column26: Kolor Lines is a single-player game where the player removes colored balls from the board by arranging them into lines of five or more. However, every time the player moves a ball, three more balls are added to the board.
column29: Colorea y dibuja lo que más se te ocurra
column30: En esta app un jugador tiene que organizar pelotas de un color en líneas de cinco o más. Cada vez que se mueve una pelota, aparecen tres más.

column25: Simple tactical game
column26: KJumpingCube is a simple tactical game for one or two players, played on a grid of numbered squares. Each turn, players compete for control of the board by capturing or adding to one square.
column29: Juego táctico y simple
column30: Esta app es un juego táctico y simple para un o para dos jugadores. Cada persona se turna para tomar control completo del juego.

column25: Lode Runner arcade game
column26: KGoldrunner is a fast-paced platform game where the player must navigate a maze while collecting gold nuggets and avoiding enemies. A variety of level packs are included, as well as an editor to create new levels.
column29: Un juego de arcade demasiado divertido
column30: ¡Navega por varios laberintos para encontrar oro y hacerte el más poderoso del terreno!

column25: Three-in-a-row game
column26: KDiamond is a three-in-a-row game like Bejeweled. It features unlimited fun with randomly generated games and five difficulty levels with varying number of diamond colors and board sizes.
column29: Juego de tres en fila
column30: Este juego es realmente adictivo. ¡Trata de alinear a tres joyas para ganar puntos y seguir en el juego!

column25: Black Box puzzle game
column26: KBlackBox is a game of hide and seek played on an grid of boxes, where the player shoots rays into the grid to deduce the positions of hidden objects.
column29: Un rompecabezas divertidísimo
column30: En esta app el jugador tiene que disparar rayos a la cuadrícula para poder deducir las posiciones de los objetos escondidos.

column25: Game based on Rubik's Cube
column26:
Kubrick is a game based on Rubik's Cube and using OpenGL 3-D graphics libraries.

Kubrick handles cubes, "bricks" and "mats" from 2x2x1 up to 6x6x6. It has several built-in puzzles of graded difficulty, as well as demos of solving moves and pretty patterns. The game has unlimited undo, redo, save and reload capabilities.
column29: Juego basado en el Cubo de Rubik

column25: Jigsaw puzzle game
column26:
Palapeli is a jigsaw puzzle game. Unlike other games in that genre, you are not limited to aligning pieces on imaginary grids. The pieces are freely movable.

Palapeli is the Finnish word for jigsaw puzzle.
column29: Un rompecabezas como nunca haz jugado

column25: Go game
column26: Kigo is an open-source implementation of the popular Go game. Go is a strategic board game for two players. It is also known as igo (Japanese), weiqi or wei ch'i (Chinese) or baduk (Korean). Go is noted for being rich in strategic complexity despite its simple rules. The game is played by two players who alternately place black and white stones (playing pieces, now usually made of glass or plastic) on the vacant intersections of a grid of 19x19 lines (9x9 or 13x13 for easier games).
column29: Un juego vigorizante
column30: ¿Te gusta la estrategia? Encuentra a un adversario formidable y prepárate para horas de entretenimiento.

column25: Jezzball arcade game
column26: KBounce is a game where the player builds walls to confine a number of bouncing balls.
column29: Juego de paredes y rebotes
column30: Esta es una app donde el jugador tiene que construir paredes para contener las pelotas que rebotan.

column25: Classical snake action game
column26: In KSnake you steer a snake which has to eat food. While eating, the snake grows. But once a player collides with the other snake or the wall, the game is lost. This becomes, of course, more and more difficult the longer the snakes grow.
column29: Juego clásico de acción con una serpiente
column30: En este juego tienes que guiar una serpiente hacia su comida. Al comer, la serpiente crece. Si el jugador choca contra otra serpiente o contra la pared, el juego se acaba.

column25: Tron-like snakerace game
column26: The object of the game is to avoid running into walls, your own tail, and that of your opponent, while at the same time you have to try to get your opponent to run into them.
column29: Un juego de arcade tipo Tron
column30: El objetivo de este juego es evitar chocar contra paredes, tu cola o la cola de tu oponente. A la misma vez, tienes que hacer que tu oponente se choque.

column25: SameGame puzzle game
column26: Klickety is a puzzle game where the player removes groups of colored marbles to clear the board.
column29: Un juego de rompecabezas y estrategia
column30: En esta app de rompecabezas el jugador quita grupos de canicas de diferentes colores para poder despejar la pantalla.

column25: Adaptation of Clickomania
column26: Klickety is an adaptation of the Clickomania game. The rules are similar to those of the KSame game: your goal is to clear the board by clicking on groups to destroy them. The overall aim is to get the lowest score possible. It will provide entertainment for all abilities, but a challenge in logical thought if you want to get a really low score.
column29: Destruye grupos y mantén tus puntos bajos para ganar
column30: En éste juego, en lugar de tratar de ganar más puntos, tienes que tratar de perder puntos. O más bien, de no ganar ningunos puntos. Haz clic en grupos para destruirlos y mantener tus puntos lo más bajo posible.

column25: Desktop planetarium for KDE
column26: KStars is a desktop planetarium for KDE, depicting an accurate graphical simulation of the night sky, from any location on Earth, at any date and time. The display includes 130,000 stars, 13,000 deep-sky objects, all 8 planets, the Sun and Moon, and thousands of comets and asteroids. It includes tools for astronomical calculations and can control telescopes and cameras.
column29: Planetario en tu propia computadora.
column30: ¿Te gustan los planetas y el espacio exterior? Ahora puedes tener tu propio planetario y enseñarles las estrellas, planetas y entidades espaciales a toda tu familia y a tus amigos - ¡sin tener que ser una astronauta con to propia nave espacial!

column25: Gomoku (five in line) board game
column26: Bovo is a game where two players take turns placing markers on the board, the winner being the first to complete a line of five markers.
column29: Un juego de mesa virtual
column30: En esta app dos personas se turnan para poner marcadores en el juego, y la primera persona que pone una fila de cinco marcadores seguidos gana.

column25: Minesweeper game
column26: KMines is a game where the player finds hidden mines without setting them off.
column29: Evita las minas para ganar en este juego adictivo
column30: Esta es una app donde el jugador tiene que encontrar las minas escondidas sin detonarlas.

column25: Sudoku puzzle game and solver
column26: KSudoku is a Sudoku game and solver, supporting a range of 2D and 3D Sudoku variants. In addition to playing Sudoku, it can print Sudoku puzzle sheets and find the solution to any Sudoku puzzle.
column29: Juego de Sudoku
column30: ¡Si te gusta divertirte mientras mejores tus facultades mentales, este juego de Soduko es para ti!

column25: Teacher admin console for GCompris
column26: Run GCompris (EduGames) in administration and user-management mode.
column29: Consola administrativa para maestros usando GCompris.
column30: El maestro o maestra puede usar esta app en conjunto con la app EduJuegos para controlar y dar seguimiento a las actividades de los alumnos.

column25: Falling blocks game
column26: KBlocks is a single player Tetris-like falling blocks puzzle game.
column29: Juego de bloques que caen.
column30: Un juego como Tetris donde bloques que caen para formar un rompecabezas.

column25: CD/DVD burning application
column26: Brasero is a simple application to burn, copy, and erase CD and DVD media: audio, video, or data.
column29: App para grabar CD y DVD
column30: Brasero es una app fácil de usar para grabar, copiar, y editar archivos digitales en CD y DVD: de audio, video o información.

column25: Hangman word puzzle
column26: KHangMan is the well-known Hangman game, aimed towards children aged 6 and above. It picks a random word which the player must reveal by guessing if it contains certain letters. As the player guesses letters, the word is gradually revealed, but 10 wrong guesses will end the game.
column29: Un juego educativo para niños 6+
column30: Adivina la palabra para ganar en este juego divertido hecho para niños de 6+ años. Empieza por adivinar letras hasta que puedas adivinar la palabra - ¿que tan rápido las puedes adivinar? Si fallas 10 veces, perderás y necesitarás tratar de nuevo. ¡Mejora tu vocabulario mientras te diviertes por horas!

column25: Ridiculous space shooter governed by the laws of gravity
column26: M.A.R.S is a two-dimensional space shooter game with excellent 2D-graphics, a stunning amount of particles and shader support. It offers single- and multiplayer gameplay, many impressive weapons and specials and customizable ships. In the year 3547 civilizations across the galaxy have settled their own planets, living in peace and harmony with its environment. But outside the placid habitats, the GREAT WAR is raging. As a famous fighter on your way to never ending honor and prosperity, you have to protect your planet from the imminent doom of your jealous neighbors!

column25: 3D racing game featuring Tux, the Linux penguin
column26: Extreme Tux Racer, or etracer as it is called for short, is a simple OpenGL racing game featuring Tux, the Linux mascot. The goal of the game is to slide down a snow- and ice-covered mountain as quickly as possible, avoiding the trees and rocks that will slow you down. Collect herrings and other goodies while sliding down the hill, but avoid fish bones. This game is based on the GPL version of the famous game TuxRacer.

column25: 2D motocross platform game
column26: X-Moto is a challenging 2D motocross platform game, where physics play an all important role in the gameplay. You need to control your bike to its limit, if you want to have a chance finishing the more difficult of the challenges.

column25: Toy train simulation game
column26: Ri-li is a game in which you drive a wooden toy steam locomotive across many levels and collect all the coaches to win.

column25: Great 2D soccer (sometimes called football) game
column26: It's bringing old style gameplay from DOS times back to the desktop with up to date graphics! Its gameplay is similar to old classics such as Amco's Kick Off and Sensible Software's Sensible Soccer. The gameplay is designed to be quick, responsive and fun. You are always in control of the player closest to the ball. The ball is controlled via two different kick buttons - one for pass, and one for shoot. Aftertouch can be applied to shots by quickly pressing and holding the direction you want the ball to bend towards. Pushing in the opposite direction to what you kicked the ball makes it raise into the air, pushing in the same direction as the ball makes it dip towards the ground.

column25: Air hockey game for single players
column26: TuxPuck is an air hockey game and clone of the Amiga/Atari ST game Shufflepuck Café. The player moves a bat around a table and tries to knock the puck past the opponent's defense. After either party has reached 15 points, the match is over.

column25: 3D racing cars simulator game using OpenGL
column26: TORCS, The Open Racing Car Simulator is a car racing simulation game which allows you to drive in races against opponents simulated by the computer. You can also develop your own computer-controlled driver (also called a robot) in C or C++. TORCS is GPL (version 2 or later).

column25: Globe and map widget
column26: Marble is a generic geographical map widget and framework for KDE applications. The Marble widget shows the earth as a sphere but does not require hardware acceleration. A minimal set of geographical data is included, so it can be used without an internet connection.

column25: Tank-battling game
column26: Atomic tanks is a multi-player game in which you attempt to destroy other tanks while trying to protect your own. You earn money for destroying other tanks; with this money you can buy upgrades and better weapons for your tank. This game is similar Scorched Earth or the Worms series of games.

column25: 3D real time strategy game
column26: In Warzone 2100 you command the forces of “The Project” in a battle to rebuild the world after mankind has almost been destroyed by nuclear missiles. The game offers campaign, tutorial, multi-player and single-player skirmish modes. An extensive tech tree with over 400 different technologies, combined with the unit design system, allows for a wide variety of possible units and tactics. Warzone 2100 was created by Pumpkin Studios, published by Eidos Interactive and is currently developed by the Warzone 2100 Project.

column25: Multiplayer infinite-world block sandbox
column26: Minetest is a minecraft-inspired game written from scratch and licensed under the LGPL (version 2.1 or later). It supports both survival and creative modes along with multiplayer support, dynamic lighting, and an "infinite" map generator.

column25: Fantasy turn-based strategy game
column26: Battle for control of villages, using variety of units which have advantages and disadvantages in different types of terrains and against different types of attacks. Units gain experience and advance levels, and are carried over from one scenario to the next in a campaign.

column25: Simple 2D shooting strategy game set in space, with gravity
column26: Slingshot is a two dimensional, turn based simulation-strategy game set in the gravity fields of several planets. It is a highly addictive game, and never the same from round to round due to its randomly generated playing fields. It is a deceptively simple game, the goal is to shoot the other spacecraft through the field of planets, but their gravity makes it tricky. The effects of the gravity mean that although it is easy to learn how to play, and to enjoy playing, it could take a lifetime to thoroughly master.

column25: Turn-based artillery game on 2D maps
column26: WarMUX is a free game in the genre of turn-based artillery games like Scorched Earth or Worms. Several players can play together, either locally or over the network. It is also possible to compete against computer-driven teams. The teams are styled after the mascots of various free software projects.

column25: Fast 2D tank arcade game with multiplayer and split-screen modes
column26: Battle Tanks is a funny battle on your desk, where you can choose one of three vehicles and eliminate your enemy using the whole arsenal of weapons.  It has original cartoon-like graphics and cool music, it is fun and dynamic, and it has several network modes for death match and cooperative.

column25: 3D multi-player real time strategy game
column26: MegaGlest is a free 3D real-time customizable strategy game which takes place in a context which could be compared to that of the pre-renaissance Europe, with the licence that magic forces exist in the environment and can be controlled. The current version is fully playable and supports both single player games against CPU controlled players and multiplayer matches over the Internet or a LAN.
